name: Orange blast
additional_info:
06/04/2016:
- style of buttons in team analyse page changed

04/04/2016:
- trainer search bar width reduced
- light around buttons reduced

03/04/2016:
- navigation bar background and font color changed
- team name font size increased
- team name appears no more in capital letters
- team name shadow made into a light
- team logo moved towards center
- odd writing "AT" on scoreboard removed
- all buttons' color changed
- background changed into an old-style-like basketball floor one (other background options are inside the file)
- sidebar and toolbox color changed
- tabs color changed
- other minor changes


credits to user Internazionale for starting it out.
